title: The Long Road Ahead - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Pretend Lovers   Younger Love Interests
author: Yu Xiao Fan   御小凡
description:
If you and I had never met in the beginning, because of the great distance existing between the individual paths both of our lives had taken, both you and I would’ve become different people.

Xiao Ding was unmoving, never wanting to change. But, sadly, nothing ever stays the same. So, in the end—due to a remarkable set of circumstances—all he could do was carefully, and cautiously, allow himself to fall in love.

If the road we have to travel is so long, why not travel it with a companion?>
